key_beliefs: Equal-weight S&P500 (RSP) at ATH - breadth expanding, healthy market (Citrini7, high conviction)
AI capex cycle >$500B in 2026 by mag7 is justified - less of a bubble than feared (QwQiao)
NVDA trading at market multiple for 60%+ rev growth - still undervalued vs growth (Citrini7)
Warsh Fed chair nomination = hawkish regime change risk - end of Fed put narrative emerging (evanss6)
AI semis supply chain deepening beyond GPUs - memory, semicap subsystems, silicon photonics are next asymmetric trades (Citrini substack)
Solar energy at inflection - $500B/yr investment, cheapest new electricity source (Chamath)
Critical minerals strategic reserve (Project Vault $12B) - US vs China supply chain decoupling accelerating (Chamath)
Crypto long-term PMF: BTC, exchanges, stablecoins - focus on real revenue (izebel_eth)
BTC crashed to $76k end-Jan on Warsh fears + metals correlation - near-term bearish but economy strong (CryptoNarratives, evanss6)

ai_infrastructure.notes: NVDA undervalued, capex justified. Go deeper: memory supercycle (HBM, SK Hynix, Micron), semicap subsystems, advanced packaging (AMKR), silicon photonics

cybersecurity_saas.notes: Oversold, IGV opportunity. Citrini watching for AI-driven SaaS selloff opportunities

crypto_btc.notes: BTC crashed from $98k to $76k in Jan. Warsh = stronger dollar = headwind. But economy re-accelerating, Warsh may eventually pivot dovish. Near-term caution, long-term thesis intact

crypto_infra.notes: HYPE strong after supply overhang cleared. Exchanges, stablecoins, real revenue. Equity perps (trade.xyz) emerging

equities_broad.notes: RSP ATH breadth intact but Warsh hawkish risk. Economy strong, AI productivity deflationary. Bouncing from initial fear crash

precious_metals.notes: Gold/silver had blowoff top (gold $5600 -> $4400, silver $121 -> $72). Stronger dollar under Warsh = headwind. Rebounding to $5100 but risk of more downside

solar_energy.notes: NEW: $500B/yr investment, cheapest electricity. China 80-95% supply chain dominance = risk. US reshoring opportunity

autonomous_driving.notes: NEW: Waymo $126B valuation, 400k rides/week, expanding to 20 new cities. Tesla unsupervised robotaxi launch

critical_minerals.notes: NEW: Project Vault $12B US strategic reserve. Supply chain decoupling from China. FORGE alliance with 11 countries

defi.notes: On-chain activity returning (memecoins, Base AI meta) but mostly speculative

active_theses.title: NVDA undervalued relative to growth
active_theses.description: Nvidia trading at ~12m fwd market multiple despite 60%+ revenue growth. Hyperscaler capex oscillating but structural demand intact.

active_theses.title: AI semis supply chain: go deeper than GPUs
active_theses.description: Memory supercycle (HBM, SK Hynix, Micron), semicap subsystems, silicon photonics, advanced packaging (AMKR) are the next asymmetric AI trades. Generalists who only know GPUs will miss these.

active_theses.title: AI capex cycle is real, not bubble
active_theses.description: >$500B 2026 capex by mag7 justified. AI makes strong software companies stronger. SpaceX-xAI merger validates long-term AI infrastructure buildout.

active_theses.title: Market breadth healthy - RSP ATH
active_theses.description: Equal-weighted S&P500 at all-time highs. Breadth expanding. But Warsh nomination introduces hawkish risk.

active_theses.title: Warsh Fed Chair = hawkish regime change
active_theses.description: Warsh anti-QE, wants to cut Fed balance sheet. End of Fed put narrative. Stronger dollar = headwind for metals, crypto. But may pivot dovish under pressure. Economy strong and re-accelerating.

active_theses.title: Cybersecurity/SaaS selling overdone
active_theses.description: Keep selling cybersecurity because of 'SaaS' seems imprudent. IGV weakness = opportunity. Citrini actively watching for AI-driven SaaS selloff opportunities.

active_theses.title: BTC near-term bearish, long-term intact
active_theses.description: BTC crashed from $98k to $76k in Jan. Warsh = stronger dollar = headwind. Metals correlation dragged crypto down. But economy re-accelerating, Warsh will likely say dovish things. Hard asset thesis intact long-term.

active_theses.title: HYPE token - supply overhang cleared, strong fundamentals
active_theses.description: Tornado cluster done selling. Team unlocks 90% smaller than expected. HIP-4 predictions markets launching. Precious metals volume spike on HIP-3 markets. Pumped from $22 to $35 in one day after supply cleared.

active_theses.title: Solar energy investment thesis
active_theses.description: Solar attracts $500B/yr, cheapest new electricity at $30-40/MWh. 90% cost decline. China dominates 80-95% of manufacturing - US reshoring opportunity. Data centers signing 40%+ of clean energy PPAs.

active_theses.title: US critical minerals strategic reserve
active_theses.description: Project Vault $12B reserve. FORGE alliance with 11 countries. China 90% dominance in mineral processing. US securing supply chain for tech/defense.

active_theses.title: Autonomous driving reaching commercial scale
active_theses.description: Waymo $126B valuation, 400k paid rides/week, expanding to 20 cities incl Tokyo/London. Tesla unsupervised robotaxi. 90% reduction in serious injury crashes.

active_theses.title: Crypto PMF: exchanges, stablecoins, real revenue
active_theses.description: Long-term crypto PMF successes: BTC, exchanges, stablecoins. Focus on projects with real organic growth.

active_theses.title: Precious metals blowoff top - caution
active_theses.description: Gold $5600->$4400 (-21%), Silver $121->$72 (-41%). One of worst days ever. Rebounding to $5100 but Warsh stronger dollar = continued headwind.

active_theses.title: 2026 IPOs - timing chosen by companies, not investors
active_theses.description: No matter how bullish long-term, understand companies choose to IPO at favorable windows. Caution on chasing.

market_regime.label: cautious_bullish_transition
market_regime.description: Market breadth still healthy (RSP ATH) but facing Warsh hawkish regime change risk. BTC crashed to $76k, metals had blowoff top correction. Economy strong and re-accelerating. AI infrastructure thesis deepening beyond GPUs into memory/semicap/packaging. Solar energy at historic inflection. Bouncing from initial Warsh fear crash but volatility elevated.

risk_factors.description: Warsh Fed Chair = end of Fed put, anti-QE, balance sheet reduction. Stronger dollar bad for metals/crypto (evanss6, CryptoNarratives)
BTC already hit $76k. Could see further downside if Warsh tightens. But economy strong, may stabilize (evanss6)
Gold/silver had historic blowoff top and crash. May continue correcting under stronger dollar (CryptoNarratives)
Hyperscaler capex sentiment swings between positive/negative (Citrini7)
China 80-95% solar manufacturing, 90% mineral processing. Geopolitical supply chain risk (Chamath)
2026 IPO wave could absorb capital at unfavorable valuations (QwQiao)
New token launches mostly bleed. Memecoins/scams still rampant (RIVER $9B FDV scam). Speculative nonsense contained but present (CryptoNarratives)
